mapper.select: SELECT lca.id articleId, lca.article_title, lca.article_content, lca.creator, lca.article_flag, IFNULL( lcc.ac_name, 'æ— ' ) acName, lca.topic_name topicName, lca.video_url, lca.article_picture, lca.index_image, lcr.id, lcr.report_content reportContent, lcr.creator reportCreator, lcr.report_status reportStatus, lcr.report_result reportResult FROM lmshop_cms_report lcr LEFT JOIN lmshop_cms_article lca ON lca.id = lcr.report_flag_id LEFT JOIN lmshop_cms_class lcc ON lca.ac_id = lcc.id WHERE lcr.id = #{id} AND lca.ac_code = 1 AND lca.del_flag = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE lmshop_cms_report SET del_flag=1 WHERE id=#{id}
